attributes.action: Stop the closure of sheltered housing schemes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and More Councils are closing sheltered housing Schemes, Barnet being one that is considering it now,
It is nothing short of Elder Abuse,
Right now we have Laws that Protect our animals, but not our old people,
Can this be right?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the closure of sheltered housing schemes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22356


Prime Minister's Office
